channel.title: [Xbox360] How to get the dashboard in halo2[Xbox360]
channel.description:
So i was wondering if theres a glitch to get the xbox dashboard in halo 2 because none of my friends have H2 and i want to talk to them VIA mic.
Please Tell me :D

item.title: [Xbox360] How to get the dashboard in halo2[Xbox360]
item.dc:creator: @mr_arrows95 bansil
item.description:
@mr_arrows95 wrote:

[quote=“Elijah, post:2, topic:311278”]No, Halo 2 runs in an emulator, as does all of the BC games. Which doesn’t allow the XBMC to be integrated into the game.[/quote]Okay man thanks

Read full topic
item.source: [Xbox360] How to get the dashboard in halo2[Xbox360]

item.title: [Xbox360] How to get the dashboard in halo2[Xbox360]

item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

No, Halo 2 runs in an emulator, as does all of the BC games. Which doesn’t allow the XBMC to be integrated into the game.
